title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com> wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet.
EB: I would expect the combo box to always match the width of the property sheet column. It should behave the same as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible. We need to investigate to determine if this is an issue with our implementation or with SWT.
